name: Water Blossom
description:
This lovely lotus flower hangs from a delicate sterling silver cable chain. A sweetly simple charm with so much symbolism, the lotus flower is rooted in the mud, but blossoms beautifully on top of the water. It is associated with rebirth, purity, prosperity, and enlightenment. This lotus blossom is sterling silver and 19mm long X 15mm wide. The chain will be 18" unless another length is requested.

Your purchase benefits the awesome charity, Love146! Wear it with love, as you help break the chains of human slavery.

*Comes in its own gift box with description and card explaining that your purchase helps an amazing cause-the perfect gift!

name: Silver Coral and Pearl Necklace
description:
This nautical necklace is sure to get noticed. The sterling silver coral branch has a gorgeous texture and hangs elegantly next to a single white pearl...so chic and simple, you can dress it up or wear it everyday. It would also be a perfect gift for a bride to be or her bridesmaids.

*Pendants will come on an 18" sterling silver chain, but can be customized to any length you like.

**All Chains of Grace jewelry benefits the amazing charity, Love146, and comes in its own gift box with its description and card explaining your purchase helps a great cause-perfect for gifting!

name: Wise Guy
description:
This nocturnal noble has many symbolic associations. Native Americans associated the owl with wisdom and foresight, and saw her as a keeper of sacred knowledge. In ancient Egyptian, Celtic, and Hindu cultures the owl was believed to be ruler of the night and a seer of souls. Wise, perceptive, and powerful, may the traits of the owl be yours when you wear this 18" gold filled necklace featuring a 24K gold plated vermeil style owl perched in her circle of branches.
*shorter chain available upon request
*As with everything Chains of Grace, this necklace benefits Love146, an awesome organization working to abolish child sex slavery and exploitation. Wear it with Love!

name: She is Free
description:
This necklace was inspired by Love146, an amazing organization that works to abolish child sex slavery and exploitation. It features a sterling silver bird cage embellished with tiny garnets hanging from an 18" gold filled cable chain. A beautiful vermeil style dove in 24 karat gold-plated sterling silver is flying away from her cage. 

Wear this as a reminder of the new life your purchase helps create for enslaved children and as a symbol of your own personal freedom from whatever threatens to hold you back. 

**All Chains of Grace jewelry benefits the amazing charity, Love146, and comes in its own gift box with a card explaining your purchase helps a great cause-perfect for gifting!

“The only way to deal with an unfree world is to become so absolutely free that your very existence is an act of rebellion.” ~Albert Camus

name: A Little Extra Luck
description:
This charming necklace invites you to make a wish, hold on to hope, and live a life of luck and happiness. An 18" sterling silver cable chain holds a 24K gold plated disk with a clover cut out. Shamrocks are said to bring prosperity and a carefree life. A tiny sterling silver horseshoe hangs with the ends pointing up. Many believe that hanging it this way will catch and contain any good luck that happens to be floating by. But to hang it with the ends pointing down is bad luck, as all the good luck will fall out. And the sterling silver wishbone charm is for wishing, of course!

*Chain can be customized to any length you like!

**If you would prefer just one of these charms on the chain by itself, just message me for the adjusted price:)

**All Chains of Grace jewelry benefits the amazing charity, Love146, and comes in its own gift box with its description and card explaining your purchase helps a great cause-perfect for gifting!
